title: Coleen Rooney, Rebekah Vardy social media fiasco, explained
text:
CLOSE

It's an international break in the soccer world, meaning not a lot is happening.

Well, not a lot was happening. On Wednesday morning, one of the great soccer stories of recent memory broke, and it was all centered on Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy.

This story has everything: A mystery, an investigation, a surprise twist, a denial. It's got it all. It just about broke the Soccer Internet on Wednesday morning.

So let's go and get to the bottom of it.

Who is this now?

This story centers on two people: Coleen Rooney, who is the wife of D.C. United attacker and England legend, Wayne Rooney, and Rebekah Vardy, the wife of Jamie Vardy, who is a striker for Leicester City and has played with Rooney on the England national team.

What happened?

So, Coleen Rooney had noticed that details of her personal life had ended up in an English tabloid newspaper, The Sun. She also noticed that the details would only have been known to people who had access to her private Instagram account, which was a limited group of people.

So she decided to do something about it.

This sounds exciting.

You have no idea. Rooney had a hunch that it was Vardy, she says, so over the course of several months she posted fake stories to her private Instagram account. These stories included one about her home's basement flooding, and another one about going to Mexico to do a gender selection procedure. They were all fake.

But she set her Instagram Story settings so that only Vardy could see it.

No.

Yes.

Wow.

Yes, so those stories ended up in The Sun, and Rooney now had proof it was Vardy. Or proof to her, anyway.

How do we know about all this?

Because Rooney posted the whole amazing saga to her Twitter account.

This has been a burden in my life for a few years now and finally I have got to the bottom of it...... pic.twitter.com/0YqJAoXuK1 — Coleen Rooney (@ColeenRoo) October 9, 2019

What is Vardy saying?

Rebekah Vardy posted a response, claiming that other people have access to her social media accounts, and it wasn't her, basically.

How have Wayne Rooney and Jamie Vardy reacted to this?

No word yet, but a world sits … and waits.

Are people making jokes about this?

More jokes than you would ever imagine.
description: The wife of Wayne Rooney ran a months-long investigation to find out who was leaking private stories to a tabloid. Here's how it all was exposed.
